message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV

The paper proposes a machine learning approach for linking job seekers with relevant jobs based on the text content in job titles and descriptions. This involves exploiting domain knowledge available in an occupation-specific knowledge base and incorporating a listwise loss function inspired by learning to rank. Therefore, the paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Machine Learning (cs.LG), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Computer Vision (cs.CV) sub-categories.
